headline: Paycom Data Reveals Unexpected Trends in Employee Summer Vacation Habits
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, June 04, 2025--Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) ("Paycom"), a leading provider of comprehensive, cloud-based human capital management software, revealed workplace data around U.S. employees’ summer time-off habits. According to Paycom, nearly one-quarter of employees do not officially submit their vacation requests until the day of their trip, or weeks after the fact.
